title: Transposition Job
description: Activity in which a composite dataset was used by a script to run the storm transposition model and create model output data.

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be aorc:TranspositionJob.

wasStartedBy.title: Started By
wasStartedBy.description: The script responsible for starting the model.

used.title: Composite Used
used.description: Composite dataset used during the run of the model
